skins.name: Buling
skins.description: An outfit in Mengzhou's style, adorned with shiny trinkets and jingling bellsâ€”perfect for its carefree, spirited wearer.

tags.name: DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Electro Flare
tags.description: Utilizes Electro Flare for combat advantage

247.name: Exorcist Gadgets, Lend Me Your Power
247.description: The Crit. Rate of <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation - Flashing Thunder Spell: Harmony</color> is increased by {0} upon dealing damage.

248.name: Talisman Burns, Spirits Turn
248.description: Buling restores {0} points of Resonance Energy when she enters the <color=Highlight><te href=130702>Yin-Yang Balance</te></color> state. This effect is triggered once every {1}s.

249.name: Summoner of Spirits, Seeker of Fate
249.description: While <color=Highlight><te href=130703>Five Thunders Spell Array</te></color> lasts, whenever the HP of Resonators in the team drops below {0}, immediately restore their HP by {1}+{2} of Buling's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 24s.

250.name: Wanderer of Solaris, Blessed by Fortune

251.name: Forum Ban? New Account!
251.description: <color=Highlight><te href=130703>Five Thunders Spell Array</te></color> instantly inflicts another {0} stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=850013>Electro Flare</te></color> on all targets within its range upon generation.

252.name: "Almighty Forum Lord of Thunder Spell"
252.description: The <color=Highlight><te href=130704>Thunder Spell - Heaven, Earth, Mind</te></color> state now grants {0} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> DMG Bonus to the active Resonator in the team.

params.name: Hexagram Calls, Lightning Falls
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Mountain Over Thunder</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Hold Normal Attack</color> to consume the highlighted Trigram - Mountain and Trigram - Thunder from left to right and cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mountain Over Thunder</color>, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Thunder Over Mountain</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Hold Normal Attack</color> to consume the highlighted Trigram - Thunder and Trigram - Mountain from left to right and cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Thunder Over Mountain</color>, dealing a small amount of <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and additionally reducing the target's Vibration Strength.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Twin Mountains</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Hold Normal Attack</color> to consume the highlighted 2 Trigrams - Mountain from left to right and cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Twin Mountains</color>, healing all nearby Resonators in the team.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Twin Thunders</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Hold Normal Attack</color> to consume the highlighted 2 Trigrams - Thunder from left to right and cast <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Twin Thunders</color>, healing all nearby Resonators in the team once per second for {0}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Ghost Gate Omen</color></size>
When <color=Highlight>holding Normal Attack</color> with fewer than {1} Trigrams, Buling fails the divination, becoming temporarily immobilized and losing all Trigrams and {2} of her current HP. This effect will not consume HP if Buling's current HP is below {3}.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform Mid-air Attack, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> right after a successful Dodge to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color>.
- After performing <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color>, <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack</color> to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Trigram</color></size>
Buling can hold up to {4} Trigrams. When Trigrams reach the max number, gaining new Trigrams moves all Trigrams {5} slot to the left, and the original leftmost Trigram will be removed.
- Trigram - Mountain is obtained when <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 2</color> deals damage.
- Trigram - Thunder is obtained when <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color> or <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> deals damage.
- Trigram - Thunder is obtained when casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill - In Shadow Thunder Stirs</color>.

params.name: In Shadow Thunder Stirs
params.description:
Attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and continuously pulling in nearby targets.
- Right after casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color>, <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack</color> to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 4</color>.

params.name: Time Arrives, Evil Declines
params.description: Buling gains {1} Healing Bonus when restoring HP for Resonators with less than {0} HP.

params.name: Earthly Immortal is Here!
params.description: Targets damaged by <color=Highlight>Intro Skill - Summon and Smite</color> obtain {0} stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=850013>Electro Flare</te></color>. This effect is triggered once every {1}s.

params.name: Summon and Smite
params.description: Attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and healing all nearby Resonators in the team.

params.name: Thunder Begets Life
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Yin-Yang Balance</color></size>
When Buling obtains Minor Yin and Minor Yang, she enters the <color=Highlight>Yin-Yang Balance</color> state, replacing her <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation - Flashing Thunder Spell</color> with <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation - Flashing Thunder Spell: Harmony</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Flashing Thunder Spell - Harmony</color></size>
Attack the target, dealing <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and generating a <color=Highlight>Five Thunders Spell Array</color> at the target area. The array deals <color=Thunder>Electro DMG</color> and inflicts {1} stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=850013>Electro Flare</te></color> on all targets within it every {0}s, lasting for {2}s. When <color=Highlight>Five Thunders Spell Array</color> is active, all Resonators in the team enter the <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Primordial Qi</color> state.
- While in the <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Primordial Qi</color> state, when any Resonator in the team casts <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color>,  <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Primordial Qi</color> becomes <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Yin and Yang</color>.
- <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Yin and Yang</color> grants {3} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> DMG Bonus to all active Resonators in the team. When any Resonator in the team casts <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color> during this state, <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Yin and Yang</color> becomes <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Heaven, Earth, Mind</color>.
- <color=Highlight>Thunder Spell - Heaven, Earth, Mind</color> grants {4} <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> DMG Bonus to all active Resonators in the team.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Minor Yang and Minor Yin</color></size>
- Minor Yang is obtained after casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Mountain Over Thunder</color> or <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Thunder Over Mountain</color>.
- Minor Yin is obtained after casting <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Twin Mountains</color> or <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack - Twin Thunders</color>.

1307031.name: Five Thunders Spell Array Continuous DMG

params.name: Exorcism Spell
params.description: Heal the active Resonator in the team by {0} of Buling's ATK per second for {1}s. All nearby Resonators in the team have their DMG Amplified by {2} for {3}s.

params.name: Tune Break: Rectifier
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
